select * from (select rownum as rnum, a.* from (select str.*, (select round(avg(nvl(score, 0)), 1) from tb_review_study) avr, nvl(man, 0) + 1 pcnt from tb_study_recruitment str, tb_review_study rv, (select study_num, count(*) man from TB_PARTICIPANT where condition = 2 group by study_num) c where c.STUDY_NUM(+) = str.STUDY_NUM and str.study_num = rv.study_num(+)
and str.email like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
and str.title like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
and str.content like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
order by str.see_cnt desc
order by str.reg_date desc
order by avr desc
) a) where rnum between #{begin} and #{end}
select str.*, (select avg(nvl(score, 0)) from tb_review_study) average from tb_study_recruitment str left outer join tb_review_study rv on str.study_num = rv.study_num where str.study_num = #{num}
